name: Nehanda Radio
description:
Nehanda Radio is a Zimbabwean radio station that provides 24 hour running news on the website and during broadcasts. We also aim to provide breaking news as it happens via our popular e-mail alert system which listeners and readers can subscribe to.
	Show more

name: ZiFM
description:
Similarly, we strive to be ‘The Station of Choice’ when it comes to the youthful-minded decision-makers in Zimbabwe.

name: Praise
description:
Praise 105.2 Radio therefore seeks to provide an opportunity to both the Zimbabwe and the international community to be saved and receive Jesus Christ  through access to Christian radio in the form of  gospel music, audio bibles and sermons. The station will play its role as commanded in Mark 16:15, “And He said to them, ‘Go into all the world and preach the gospel to every creature.’  ﻿﻿
	Show more

name: zim NET radio
description:
Zim NET radio - Main Channel is an internet radio station from Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, providing Community News, Information and Entertainment to the Zimbabwe Diaspora.
	Show more

name: Heart and Soul Radio Zim
description: Heart and Soul broadcasting services is a world class content digital service provider and distributor for global citizen.
